# Web Layout Snapshot Checklist

- [ ] Confirm page title and final URL
- [ ] Capture full-page screenshot
- [ ] Capture ARIA snapshot
- [ ] Identify primary navigation links
- [ ] Identify hero/featured area
- [ ] Note repeating card/grid patterns
- [ ] Record sidebar modules (if any)
- [ ] List obvious entry-point links
- [ ] Note thumbnail and media hostnames
- [ ] Note pagination or "view more" links
- [ ] Document access limitations (Cloudflare, JS-only)
